title: Video Shows Phone Exploding in CeeLo Green’s Face?
subtitle: Undated and unverified surveillance video supposedly showed former 'The Voice' star CeeLo Green falling to the ground when a mobile phone exploded in his face. It was actually a clip from a music video he was shooting.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Singer and former "The Voice" star CeeLo Green was injured in a mobile phone explosion captured on video.
